meanings.definition: The act of sliding downhill on a snowboard.
meanings.sent1: Snowboarding is fun in the winter.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching snowboarding competitions on TV.
meanings.sent3: When I tried snowboarding, I ended up in a snowdrift!
meanings.sent4: Her graceful snowboarding was like a dance on the snow.
meanings.sent5: The sound of snowboarding down the mountain echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of snowboarding.
meanings.sent1: We are planning a snowboarding trip next weekend.
meanings.sent3: I fell so many times while snowboarding that I made a snow angel.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to snowboarding is as strong as his love for the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of snowboarding down the slope is unmatched.
